metadata.title: CVE-2021-33178 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The Manage Backgrounds functionality within NagVis versions prior to 1.9.29is vulnerable to an authenticated path traversal vulnerability.Exploitation of this results in a malicious actor having the ability toarbitrarily delete files on the local system.

criterions.comment: nagvis package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
